articles.content: Recent articles by Mark Lawson (The day I thwarted Jimmy Savile, 1 April) and Lucy Mangan (Jimmy Savile: A British Horror Story review, 6 April) reminded me vividly of the sentiment expressed by Dr A… [+566 chars]

articles.title: What we can learn from Princess Anne's 'no stylist' approach to royal tours - The Telegraph
articles.description: There’s nothing wrong with wearing a garment twice in one week
articles.content: While its unlikely that Anne has been on a shopping spree for this tour, there are some subtle updates which indicate that she is au fait with current trends. The bateau neckline of a white T-shirt, … [+1430 chars]

articles.title: Taskmaster's Alex Horne confirms new Channel 4 show - Digital Spy

articles.title: Gilbert Gottfried and the greatest joke ever told - Spiked
articles.description: His stand-up pulled no punches and left no social norm un-transgressed. RIP.
